oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Retailer globalization
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kledal, Paul Rye
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presentation on retailers who have gone global, the different strategies they have pursued and the drivers and motivations for the major retailer chains for going global.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kledal, Paul Rye (2008) Retailer globalization. Speech at: Workshop on retailer globalization, Institute of Food and Resource Economics, 4th of April 2008.
